languages.text: "Ты странствуешь среди звезд и долж{mf|ен|на} знать это место... Древний простор, в котором еще звучит эхо звездной агонии. Место, что служит кладбищем старинных звезд, по-прежнему полное остаточных излучений и сияющей пыли. Место, что похоронило вашу жестянку, набитую сладкими, испуганными мон-кай и ужасами, что пожрали их. Порог нашего царства. Вы называете его Цинерус Малефикум. Там мы и решим наши разногласия. Кабал Опустошительной бури будет ждать тебя, мон-кай — не приходи безоружным".

traits.locale_text: "Ты странствуешь среди звезд и долж{mf|ен|на} знать это место... Древний простор, в котором еще звучит эхо звездной агонии. Место, что служит кладбищем старинных звезд, по прежнему полное остаточных излучений и сияющей пыли. Порог нашего царства. Вы называете его Цинерус Малефикум. Там мы и решим наши разногласия. Кабал Опустошительной Бури будет ждать тебя, мон-кай — не приходи безоружным".

languages.text: "You wander among the stars, so you must know of this place. An ancient reach where the echo of stellar agony rings still. A place that serves as a graveyard for old stars, still filled with residual emissions and glittering dust. The place that buried your wreck stuffed full of delicious, frightened mon-keigh and the horrors that devoured them. The threshold of our domain. Your kind call it the Cinerus Maleficum. That is where our disputes will be settled. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest will be waiting for you, mon-keigh — do not come unarmed."
languages.original_text: "Ты странствуешь среди звезд и долж{mf|ен|на} знать это место... Древний простор, в котором еще звучит эхо звездной агонии. languages.text: «Tú también vagas entre las estrellas, así que debes de conocer el lugar. Es un sitio recóndito en el que la agonía de las estrellas aún resuena. Un cementerio de astros viejos, lleno de emisiones residuales y polvo resplandeciente. Es donde están sepultados los restos de naves llenas de deliciosos mon-keigh aterrados y los horrores que los devoraron. Es el umbral de nuestros dominios. Tu gente lo llama el Cinerus Maleficum. Ahí resolveremos nuestra disputa. La Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora te estará esperando, mon-keigh. Trae tus mejores armas».
languages.original_text: "You wander among the stars, so you must know of this place. An ancient reach where the echo of stellar agony rings still. A place that serves as a graveyard for old stars, still filled with residual emissions and glittering dust. The place that buried your wreck stuffed full of delicious, frightened mon-keigh and the horrors that devoured them. The threshold of our domain. Your kind call it the Cinerus Maleficum. That is where our disputes will be settled. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest will be waiting for you, mon-keigh — do not come unarmed."

traits.locale_text: «Tú también vagas entre las estrellas, así que debes de conocer el lugar. Es un sitio recóndito en el que la agonía de las estrellas aún resuena. Un cementerio de astros viejos, lleno de emisiones residuales y polvo resplandeciente. Es donde están sepultados los restos de naves llenas de deliciosos mon-keigh aterrados y los horrores que los devoraron. Es el umbral de nuestros dominios. Tu gente lo llama el Cinerus Maleficum. Ahí resolveremos nuestra disputa. La Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora te estará esperando, mon-keigh. Trae tus mejores armas».

languages.text: “你在群星之中游荡，你肯定听说过这个地方。那里是一片古老的星区，如今依然回荡着群星痛苦的回声。无数古老的恒星在那里消亡，留下了无数余烬与尘埃。那里也会是你们的葬身之处。届时，那里会充满了美味的、被吓破了胆的猴子，以及吞噬它们的恐怖之物。那里是我们的世界的门槛，你的同类称那里为‘苍灰恶咒’，我们会在那里解决争端。狂风阴谋团会在那里等着你们，猴子，不要双手空空地过来。”
languages.original_text: "You wander among the stars, so you must know of this place. An ancient reach where the echo of stellar agony rings still. A place that serves as a graveyard for old stars, still filled with residual emissions and glittering dust. The place that buried your wreck stuffed full of delicious, frightened mon-keigh and the horrors that devoured them. The threshold of our domain. Your kind call it the Cinerus Maleficum. That is where our disputes will be settled. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest will be waiting for you, mon-keigh — do not come unarmed."

traits.locale_text: “你在群星之中游荡，你肯定听说过这个地方。那里是一片古老的星区，如今依然回荡着群星痛苦的回声。无数古老的恒星在那里消亡，留下了无数余烬与尘埃。那里也会是你们的葬身之处。届时，那里会充满了美味的、被吓破了胆的猴子，以及吞噬它们的恐怖之物。那里是我们的世界的门槛，你的同类称那里为‘苍灰恶咒’，我们会在那里解决争端。狂风阴谋团会在那里等着你们，猴子，不要双手空空地过来。”

languages.text: 「お前は星々を旅するからこの場所のことも知っているだろう。星の苦悩の叫び声が今なお鳴り響く、古の到達点だ。古い星々の墓場であり、残留放射と輝く塵で満たされた場所だ。甘美なほどに怯えたモン＝ケイが閉じ込めれた難破船と、彼らを飲みこんだ恐怖が埋められた場所…我々の領域への入り口だ。お前たちはそれを「サイネラス・マレフィカム」と呼んでいる。我々の争いはそこで決着をつけよう。略奪の嵐の陰謀団がお前を待つぞ、モン＝ケイ――十分覚悟してかかってくるといい」
languages.original_text: "You wander among the stars, so you must know of this place. An ancient reach where the echo of stellar agony rings still. A place that serves as a graveyard for old stars, still filled with residual emissions and glittering dust. The place that buried your wreck stuffed full of delicious, frightened mon-keigh and the horrors that devoured them. The threshold of our domain. Your kind call it the Cinerus Maleficum. That is where our disputes will be settled. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest will be waiting for you, mon-keigh — do not come unarmed."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は星々を旅するからこの場所のことも知っているだろう。星の苦悩の叫び声が今なお鳴り響く、古の到達点だ。古い星々の墓場であり、残留放射と輝く塵で満たされた場所だ。甘美なほどに怯えたモン＝ケイが閉じ込めれた難破船と、彼らを飲みこんだ恐怖が埋められた場所…我々の領域への入り口だ。お前たちはそれを「サイネラス・マレフィカム」と呼んでいる。我々の争いはそこで決着をつけよう。略奪の嵐の陰謀団がお前を待つぞ、モン＝ケイ――十分覚悟してかかってくるといい」

languages.text: "Ihr wandert zwischen den Sternen, also müsst Ihr den Ort kennen. Ein uralter Bereich, in dem das Echo stellarer Agonie noch heute widerhallt. Ein Ort, der als Friedhof für alte Sterne dient, immer noch angefüllt mit Reststrahlung und glitzerndem Staub. Der Ort, wo Euer Wrack begraben liegt, samt den leckeren, verängstigten Chem-Pan-Sey und den Schrecken, die sie verschlungen haben. Die Schwelle zu unserem Reich. Eure Spezies nennt sie den Cinerus Maleficum. Dort werden wir unseren Disput beilegen. Die Kabale des plündernden Sturms wird Euch erwarten, Chem-Pan-Sey – kommt nicht unbewaffnet."
languages.original_text: "You wander among the stars, so you must know of this place. An ancient reach where the echo of stellar agony rings still. A place that serves as a graveyard for old stars, still filled with residual emissions and glittering dust. The place that buried your wreck stuffed full of delicious, frightened mon-keigh and the horrors that devoured them. The threshold of our domain. Your kind call it the Cinerus Maleficum. That is where our disputes will be settled. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest will be waiting for you, mon-keigh — do not come unarmed."

The place that buried your wreck stuffed full of delicious, frightened mon-keigh and the horrors that devoured them. The threshold of our domain. Your kind call it the Cinerus Maleficum. That is where our disputes will be settled. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest will be waiting for you, mon-keigh — do not come unarmed."

languages.text: « Vous qui voyagez parmi les étoiles, vous devez connaître cet endroit : un lieu ancien où résonne encore l'écho de la souffrance stellaire. Un cimetière de vieilles étoiles, toujours rempli d'émissions résiduelles et de poussière scintillante. Le seuil de notre domaine, là où a succombé votre épave remplie de délicieux mon-keigh terrifiés et des horreurs qui les ont dévorés. Vous l'appelez le Cinerus Maleficum. C'est là que nous réglerons nos comptes. La Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse vous attendra, mon-keigh. Veillez à bien vous armer. »
languages.original_text: "You wander among the stars, so you must know of this place. An ancient reach where the echo of stellar agony rings still. A place that serves as a graveyard for old stars, still filled with residual emissions and glittering dust. The place that buried your wreck stuffed full of delicious, frightened mon-keigh and the horrors that devoured them. The threshold of our domain. Your kind call it the Cinerus Maleficum. That is where our disputes will be settled. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest will be waiting for you, mon-keigh — do not come unarmed."

traits.locale_text: « Vous qui voyagez parmi les étoiles, vous devez connaître cet endroit : un lieu ancien où résonne encore l'écho de la souffrance stellaire. Un cimetière de vieilles étoiles, toujours rempli d'émissions résiduelles et de poussière scintillante. Le seuil de notre domaine, là où a succombé votre épave remplie de délicieux mon-keigh terrifiés et des horreurs qui les ont dévorés. Vous l'appelez le Cinerus Maleficum. C'est là que nous réglerons nos comptes. La Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse vous attendra, mon-keigh. Veillez à bien vous armer. »

languages.text: "Yıldızlar arasında yolculuk ediyorsun ya, burayı biliyorsundur. Burası, göksel ızdırabın yankılandığı kadim bir diyardır. Eski yıldızların kabristanıdır; kalıntılar ve parıltılı tozlarla doludur. Dehşete kapılmış, leziz mon-keighlerle dolu bir enkazın ve onları silip süpüren musibetlerin süregeldiği yerdir. Senin türün buraya Cinerus Maleficum diyor. Anlaşmazlıklarımızı orada noktalayacağız. Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı seni bekliyor olacak mon-keigh, silahlarını hazır et."
languages.original_text: "You wander among the stars, so you must know of this place. An ancient reach where the echo of stellar agony rings still. A place that serves as a graveyard for old stars, still filled with residual emissions and glittering dust. The place that buried your wreck stuffed full of delicious, frightened mon-keigh and the horrors that devoured them. The threshold of our domain. Your kind call it the Cinerus Maleficum. That is where our disputes will be settled. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest will be waiting for you, mon-keigh — do not come unarmed."

traits.locale_text: "Yıldızlar arasında yolculuk ediyorsun ya, burayı biliyorsundur. Burası, göksel ızdırabın yankılandığı kadim bir diyardır. Eski yıldızların mezarlığıdır; kalıntılar ve parıltılı tozlarla doludur. Dehşete kapılmış, leziz mon-keighlerle dolu bir enkazın ve onları silip süpüren musibetlerin süregeldiği yerdir. Senin türün buraya Cinerus Maleficum diyor. Anlaşmazlıklarımızı orada noktalayacağız. Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı seni bekliyor olacak mon-keigh, silahlarını hazır et."
